This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Test that the (x, y, z, angle) values for CSSRotation are correct. 
PASS Test that the is2D values for CSSRotation is correct. 
PASS Test that cssText values for CSSRotation is correct. 
PASS Test that asMatrix is constructed correctly for CSSRotation. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
